nodes.bodyText: Not sure, "loot tables" is clearer don't you think?
This is in LootTableManager class, so I think loot is already implied.
c2s is just chat, not game messages
Isn't this like /title actionbar? This could be ARG 2 actionBar.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -192,8 +192,9 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1657 net/minecraft/entity/player/PlayerEntity
 	METHOD method_7350 resetLastAttackedTicks ()V
 	METHOD method_7351 getBlockBreakingSpeed (Lnet/minecraft/class_2680;)F
 		ARG 1 block
-	METHOD method_7353 addChatMessage (Lnet/minecraft/class_2561;Z)V
+	METHOD method_7353 addGameMessage (Lnet/minecraft/class_2561;Z)V
 		ARG 1 message
+		ARG 2 infoMessage

nodes.bodyText: Action bar messages are referred to info message type in the code, but "actionBar" is probably clearer?
